channel.title: Problem with darts
channel.description:
Im trying to make it so when you use a dart on my server, the dart will go away from the equip slot and disappear. Thanks if you can help! :p
Edit: basically when you use a steel dart, or bronze,etc. once the dart is used, it gets taken from the equip slot and dropped on the ground, I made a new dart for insta kill dart and i want it to be taken from equip slot and disappear instead of dropped on ground, and the dart in using is dragon dart and doesn't even get taken when used or dropped, basically acting as a infinite dart..

item.title: Problem with darts
item.dc:creator: @jacobkid jacobkid
item.description:
@jacobkid wrote:

Im trying to make it so when you use a dart on my server, the dart will go away from the equip slot and disappear.
Thanks if you can help!

Edit:
basically when you use a steel dart, or bronze,etc. once the dart is used, it gets taken from the equip slot and dropped on the ground, I made a new dart for insta kill dart and i want it to be taken from equip slot and disappear instead of dropped on ground, and the dart in using is dragon dart and doesn’t even get taken when used or dropped, basically acting as a infinite dart…
